thread.title: Lovely Hotel, Good Location & Friendly Staff!
thread.title_full: Lovely Hotel, Good Location & Friendly Staff! - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York Long Island City / Manhattan View, Long Island City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: John E
title: Lovely Hotel, Good Location & Friendly Staff!
text:
This hotel is in a great location only a few minutes walk from the nearest subway station.
The hotel is modern but still it has been well looked after.
The staff were great from check in until check out they were always there to help or answer any questions.
The rooms were a good size & the bathroom was very nice.
Price wise for New York this was very good value!
Close to the hotel you will find a few stores for snacks, food etc which was very handy.
